# SCNParticleEvent.death

**Case**

Occurs when particles reach the end of their life span.

## Declaration

```swift
case death
```

## Discussion

SceneKit calls your event handler block immediately before removing dead particles from the scene.

## Constants

- **SCNParticleEvent.birth**: Occurs when new particles spawn.
- **SCNParticleEvent.collision**: Occurs when particles collide with scene geometry.

items.description: Occurs when particles collide with scene geometry.
